entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use ServiceCollection.MakeReadOnly in .NET 7 #6115
  • Counter is disappearing in the default MAUI project on Android #6112
  • Default MAUI project cannot be launched for Windows #6111
  • Blazor Hybrid Dev Tools Console Logging #6110
  • Setting HeightRequest/WidthRequest back to -1 currently doesn't reset WxH to unset #6107
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • .NET MAUI Blazor crashes when changing system font on Android device #6105
  • [WinUI] ContentView with a ControlTemplate is not displayed in Compatibility #6104
  • Application.Current.Windows maintains incorrect count #6103
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Change UseMauiEssentials to UsePlatformEssentials (or something similar) #6102
  • Picker doesn't show options in modal #6101
  • Changing Label Value at Runtime makes the label invisible #6100
  • Release event is fired twice when hit a button #6095
  • There's no way AFAIK of changing the color of the magnifying glass in SearchBar #6094
    6.0.300-servicing
  • RadioButton example from Xamarin Forms gallery converted to MAUI doesn't work on Android: radio buttons are not selectable #6093
  • The prompts displayed by DisplayAlert do not follow the theme set #6092

Closed

  • Debugging is harder than it need be #6034
  • Obsolete warnings on Device are no longer correct #6072
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • RC1 Compilation failed to complete #6022
  • Using a StackLayout with AndExpand causes some sort of layout loop/invalidation/re-add #3519
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Edge Developer Tools not showing after upgrading to MAUI RC1 #6098
  • The image is not displayed on Android when image source is a web resource #6099
  • NRE with Essentials Preferences on Windows #5951
  • Externally hosted images cannot load on hybrid Android apps #5986
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [iOS] Port Editor.VerticalTextAlignment to Handler #391
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [WinUI] Crashing issue in ScrollView with orientation horizontal #4951
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] LayoutOptions Expand not work in HorizontalStackLayout and VerticalStackLayout #6031
  • BlazorWebView API review: Shared sources #5905
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Bug] [Android] [MAUI Blazor] Crash on Android 5 device/emulator #3023
    6.0.300
  • Release Candidate Fails #6074
  • On screen keyboard #5272
    6.0.300
  • Create ContentPage VS template not using proper namespace when adding new ContentPage inside a folder #6049
  • Maui Blazor App (new template) will not build for iOS after update to latest VS Version 17.2.0 Preview 3.0 #6017
  • ERROR ITMS-90165: Invalid Provisioning Profile Signature #6044
  • How do we console.log to the Browser developer tools for NET MAUI Blazor? #6090
  • Make IResourcesProvider public to be able to register this on the DI Container #6045
  • template for maui blazor preview #5543
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Problem with English spelling of GREY in .NET MAUI TableView #5677
  • Add Marker/Annotation clustering for the Maps package that .NET MAUI will have #5735
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Include margin in Frame's DesiredSize #6114
    area/layout 🔲
  • Swap out virtual view when navigating to new Shell Item #6109
    area/shell 🐢
  • Views spanning both auto and star cells should not contribute to the Auto size #6106
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix WinUI class libraries a bit better #6089
    t/bug, area/single project ☝️, p/0, partner/winui, 6.0.300-rc.2

Merged

  • Use the correct text in the [Obsolete] attributes #6079
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Remove uses-sdk from the manifest #6113
    area/single project ☝️, platform/android 🤖, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Static content hot reload (CSS only for now) #6097
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [iOS] Add vertical text alignment to Editor #5996
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Leave the content panel active on the Windows scrollview at all times #6087
  • BlazorWebView API review changes: Shared sources #5982
    area/blazor 🕸️

Updated

  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Clean-up and fix VisualTreeElementExtensions hit testing #5892
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Correctly notify changes in the Page BackgroundColor property #5706
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Fix for 3848 - FlexLayout doesn't measure content #6085
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650
    area/architecture
  • Fix nullable annotations for `Preferences` #6013
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Move Handler?.UpdateValue after PropertyChanged events #5980
    area/controls 🎮
  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, .NET 7
